utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here you go Pheebs. Who else wants one of my special homemade brownies?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I will have one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I'm not gonna have one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Neither will I.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, it's just my tooth.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right I'll have one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So what's a matter, you need a dentist? I've got a good one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No thanks, I have a good one too. I just, I, I can't see him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See that is the problem with invisible dentists.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why? Why can't you go to him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because, every time I go to the dentist, somebody dies.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That is so weird, because every time I go to the dentist, I look down the hygienist's blouse.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, what? Umm...what?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, first there was my aunt Mary, and then there was umm, John, my mailman, and then my, my cowboy friend 'Albino Bob'.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And all these people actually died?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, while I was in the chair! That's why I take such good care of my teeth now, y'know, it's not about oral hygiene, I floss to save lives!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs, come on, you didn't kill anybody, these people just happened to die when you went to the dentist. It's, it's, it's just ah, a coincidence.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well tell that to them. Oh! You can't, their dead.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks, Gunther. Hey! Umm, can I get a napkin too?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Oh, like you don't already have everything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ow! Ow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, your in pain, would you just go to the dentist, just go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, fine, fine, but if you're my next victim, don't come back as a poltergeist and like suck me into the TV set.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I promise.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Although, don't feel like you can't visit.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, is, is, is Chandler here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no he's not.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You guys, Joey just saw Janice kissing her ex-husband.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? So what are you going to do? I mean how, how are you going to tell Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I was thinking about that and I, I think the best way would be, to not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you can't keep this to yourself, if you know about this, you have to tell him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It'll kill him. I mean it'll, it'll just kill him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you could wait 'til I go to the dentist, maybe I'll kill him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ewww! Ugly Naked Guy is using his new hammock. It's like a Play-Doo Fat Factory.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'm going to the dentist, so listen, okay, just be on the look out for anything that, that, that you can fall into, or, or that can fall on you, or... All right, just look out! Okay, And um, I also just wanna, I just wanna tell you all that um......

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I have a problem I have to go into work for a few hours, some kids messed up the Homo Sapien display.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What did they do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, they painted over the word 'Sapien' for one thing, then they rearranged the figures, let's just leave it at that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, do you want me to watch Ben for you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, that's what I was going to ask, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa! Wait! Hello! What about me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You? You! Want to watch Ben? Yes! That'd be great, no, I just wanted to ask Monica, because I know how empty her life is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I've got a science question.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If the Homo Sapiens, were in fact 'Homo-sapien', is that why there extinct?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, Homo Sapiens are people.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey, I'm not judging.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look Benny, spoon. Spoon. Come on! All right, y'know what I think he's bored.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here. Ben, do you wanna play the airplane game, do you wanna show Rachel? Come here. We're gonna do something fun. Okay. Weee!! Weee!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who's so brave, you're so brave, yes you are, you're so brave.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay honey, he's fine, he's fine, let's just put him down. Come here, Ben. See that's a good boy. How could you do that to him!! Ross trusted me, what is he going to say?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He's not gonna say anything, because we're not gonna tell him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We're not?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No we're not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I like that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So we're okay, we're okay, we're okay, aren't we? No, we're not okay, we're not okay, there's a bump, there's a bump.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Well push it in! Push it in!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot push it in!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, we're gonna need a distraction.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The second that Ross walks in that door, I want you take him back to your bedroom and do whatever it is that you do that makes him go, rweee!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Or. We could put a hat on his head.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A hat! Yes! We need a hat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We need a hat..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where are we gonna find a tiny little hat?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, oh, oh, I'll get 'Rainy Day Bear'!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because he'll know what to do? Oh my God, you're a genius!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, oh God, it's sowed on though.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Give it. Give it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it's just like a bloodbath in here today.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Hold on a minute, hold on a second. Do you think these pearls are nice?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'd really prefer a mountain bike.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice's birthday is coming up, I want to get her something speacial. Come in here with me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa, wait, whoa. Do you ah, want to get her something speacial, get her flowers, get her candy, get her gum, girls love gum.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's a good idea, 'Dear Janice have a Hubba-Bubba birthday'. I would like to get her something serious.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you want something serious. Y'know what you should do, you should get her one of those um, barium enemas. Those are dead serious.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right. Look, I'm gonna go in here, and you don't buy me anything ever.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, you can't, you can't, okay, you can't, you can't buy her pearls, you just can't, you can't, you can't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh God. Uh, okay, here's the thing, this is the thing, okay, the thing is...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What is the thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. I went down to the 'Mattress King' showroom and, and I saw Janice, kissing her ex-husband.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They were in his office.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well she, she wouldn't do that, she's with, she's with me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm telling you man, I saw it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, you're wrong! Okay, you're wrong.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm not wrong! I wish I was. I'm sorry. Bet that barium enema doesn't sound so bad now, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It just makes more sense as an ensemble.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Besides, it takes the focus off the hat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Oh! You're alive! You're alive!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See Pheebs, I promised you no one would die, didn't I?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, well, we'll see about that. Can I use your phone? I just wanna call everyone I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure, we have no money, go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: 'Hey! You're not dead! Okay, see ya!'

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! He just said my name! Did you hear that?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Monica bang!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I heard that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did he just say 'Monica bang'?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! He's gonna rat me out!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Monica bang!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh-ho-ho, sweetie, sweetie, you gotta stop saying that, now. It's no big deal, it's not even worth mentioning, you see we all do it all the time. See watch this, Ben, Ben, Ben. Ow, Monica bang! Everybody bang. Ben bang. Rachel bang. Bang, Rachel bang! Oh, isn't that fun?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look at that! Look at that! We all do it. Okay, I'm stopping now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah! Y'know, if it's not a headboard, it's just not worth it.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: How's my Bing-a-ling?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, I don't know, you tell me. Anything you ah, wanna tell me, because, if you ah, you should, if you, you would, tell me.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Why are your eyes so white?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You tell me! Maybe, it's because I was just fooling with my ex! Oh no-no-no-no, no-no-no-no, that was you!!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: How did you know?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey told me, he saw you two kissing.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: In the park?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! In his office! How many kisses were there?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Just those two!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wh-wh-why, wh-why, why, why was there kissing!? There should be no kissing!!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry honey, I'm so, so, haaaaa! I'm so, so sorry, I just haaaaaa! But I, oh what happened was, I-I-I can't breathe. Can you get me a bag, or something?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: The receipt.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll take it! All right look, I gotta know. Are you finished with me? Are you finished with him? Do you still love him? Do you still love me? All right look, I'm gonna need an actual answer here okay, so which is it, him or me?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. If you're alive you answer your phone!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, Ben, I won't tell your daddy that you had ice cream for dinner, if you don't tell about our little bonking incident.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, number one, I don't think Ben understands the concept of bribery, and number two, I... What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You said number two.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I also said number one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Everyone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How's my little boy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He's perfect, he's never been better.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What'd you do, take him whaling?

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Monica.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God, he just said your name, that's great! Good job Ben.

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Monica bang!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that's right, that's what I'd sound like if I exploded.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Woo-Hoo! The curse is broken! I called everybody I know, and everyone is alive.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ugly Naked Guy looks awfully still.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! I killed him! I killed another one! And this curse is getting stronger too, to bring down something that big.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well maybe he's just taking a nap.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm tellin' ya, he hasn't moved since this morning.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, we should call somebody.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And tell them what? The naked guy we stare at all the time isn't moving.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, we have gotta find out if he's alive.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How are we gonna do that? There's no way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, there is one way. His window's open, I say, we poke him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Y'know how we ah, save all those chopsticks for no reason we get when we get Chinese food?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, now we got a reason.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, we're fashioning a very long poking device.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey uh, what's a matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I talked to Janice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, is she going back to him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She doesn't know. Says she loves us both. Y'know I woke up this morning and I was in love, well I was happy. Y'know it serves me right for buying that twelve pack of condoms. And now I can't even return them, because she choked on the reciept!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you ah, what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know, y'know. What, what, would you do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, it doesn't matter what I would do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, tell me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, you're probably not gonna want to hear this but ah, if it was me, and this is just me, I would ah, I would bow out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? What are you, what are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They have a kid together, y'know. They're like, they're like a family, and if, I don't know, there's chance they could make that work, I know I wouldn't want to be the guy who stood in the way of that. Are you okay? Do you wanna ah, come poke a nude guy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, he's finally alseep. About that ah, bump on his head?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you, are you, are you sure it's ah, a new bump? I mean, no offense, I've always thought of Ben as a fairly bumpy headed child.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's okay if he bumps his head, kids bump their heads all the time, y'know, it was your first time babysitting, I figured you did the best you could.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know! I'm saying you have to watch them all the time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did!! I watched! I watched! I watched Monica bang his head against that thing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica did it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, did you notice anything wierd about Ben today?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I was just playing with him, and y'know we were doing the alphabet song, which he used to be really good at, but suddenly he's leaving out 'e' and 'f.' It's like they just ah, I don't know, fell out of his head.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, and also, he's, he's walkin' kind of funny, his left leg is moving a lot faster than his right leg, and he's in there just sort of y'know...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, I wrecked your baby!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I hope it's still funny when you're in hell.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You jerk! You know how much I love that kid!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica bang! Monica bang! Ow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'll get the hat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice, I have something I need to tell you, and I want you to let me get through it, because it's, it's, it's not gonna be easy.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think you should go back with Gary. I don't wanna be the guy that breaks up a family, y'know when my parents split up, it was because of that guy. Whenever I would see him I was always think y'know 'You're the reason, you are the reason why their not together.' and I hated that guy. And it didn't matter how nice he was, or how happy he made my Dad.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well. It's the right thing to do.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh! You're right. Oh God. But, before I can say 'good-bye', there's something I really need you to know, Chandler. The way I feel about you, it's like, I finally understand what Lionel Richie's been singing about. Y'know, I mean what we have, it's like movie love, you're my soulmate, and I can't believe we're not going to be spending the rest of our lives together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then don't leave me!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Forget what I said, I was babbling! Pick me!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: No, you were right, you were right. I mean, I-I-I've got to give my marriage another chance.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No you don't! No, no, no, I say you have to give your divorce another chance.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohhh. Don't go.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: No, I-I-I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No! No! No!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Honey, honey, people are looking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't care! I don't care!!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Yeah, um, I'm, I'm leaving now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can't leave! I have your shoe!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Good-bye Chandler Bing.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Rachel has those in burgendy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right now remember, something this big and long is going to be difficult to manuver, fortunately I have a lot of experience in that area.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can we please focus here, a naked man's life hangs in the balance!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm telling you he's dead. What we are about to have here is a dead fat guy on a stick.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He's alive! He's a-live!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And yet, we're still poking him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, retract the device, retract the device.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He does not look happy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey-hey, now he's showing us his poking device.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that's never gonna make it all the way over here, buddy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll hold you close in my arms. I can't resist your charms. And love....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Love....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No you know I don't mind.
